member.name: IAppxManifestReader6.GetIsNonQualifiedResourcePackage
member.summary: Queries whether an app package is a non-qualified resource package.
member.param: True if the package is a non-qualified resource package, False otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestReader6
member.summary: Represents an object model of the package manifest that provides methods to access manifest elements and attributes.
